yardlistr: Generate Summary Plots from eBird Data

Source: R/yardlistr-package.R
yardlistr-package.Rd

The yardlistr package loads your personal eBird data from a csv file, processes checklists from a user-specified list of locations and generates a variety of plots for each location.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/gl-eb/yardlistr

  • https://www.gl-eb.me/yardlistr/
